SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT "og".* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT "patient_id" AS "person_id", "id" AS "criterion_id", CAST('clinical_codes' AS text) AS "criterion_table", CAST('condition_occurrence' AS text) AS "criterion_domain", "start_date", "end_date", CAST("clinical_code_source_value" AS text) AS "source_value", CAST(NULL AS integer) AS "source_vocabulary_id" FROM "clinical_codes" WHERE ("clinical_code_concept_id" IN (SELECT "id" FROM "concepts" WHERE (("vocabulary_id" = 'ADMSRCE') AND ("concept_code" IN ('12')))))) AS "t1") AS "og" WHERE (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT * FROM "jtemp") AS "tw" WHERE (("og"."person_id" = "tw"."person_id") AND (CAST((CAST("tw"."start_date" AS timestamp) + CAST('-30 days ' AS interval)) AS date) <= "og"."start_date") AND ("og"."end_date" <= CAST((CAST("tw"."end_date" AS timestamp) + CAST('1 months ' AS interval)) AS date)))))) AS "t1") AS "t1"
